extendedInfo.description: This is a plugin of 'Daily Yoga (All-in-One)', and is available only to subscribers.*** This app does not open on its own. ***Please first install the main app 'Daily Yoga (All-in-One)' from Google Play before using this plugin:http://goo.gl/yuDqJor you can download from our homepage:http://www.dailyyoga.comNature is the eternal homeland of your soul. This music collection, with well selected nature music pieces, is like a scroll embodied with ripples of water, waves of ocean, and a scene of pure paradise.Involved in such a splendid picture, you are to forget the noisy outside world, to retrieve your natural spirit, to visit the heavenly land of your heart, and to seek for the innocence of your inner self.Yoga, as an ancient practice with complete system of philosophy, wants to be the guidance to go beyond confusing reality, to build harmony between the real world and your inner nature, thus to attain higher consciousness of your existence.This album is graceful, rhythmic and very attractive with pleasant melodies. Whether you are in the training process or total relaxation, this music collection will be the best partner to comfort your heart.
